Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated underground worlds, mine resources, upgrade their vehicles, and build structures. The game features real-time multiplayer via MQTT, a shop system for upgrades, teleporters for fast travel, and cloud saves through Puter. Players can transfer fuel between each other, use explosives, and manage inventories while competing for resources in a shared persistent world.
